plot: Angélica is an ambitious, aristocratic and secretly psychotic young woman who will stop at nothing to achieve her goals, not even murdering her parents, her grandmother, her husband and her children...

cast.name: Rebecca Jones
cast.role: Angélica Perdomo de Haro de Robles del Castillo

plot_en: Angélica is an ambitious, aristocratic and secretly psychotic young woman who will stop at nothing to achieve her goals, not even murdering her parents, her grandmother, her husband and her children...
plot_es: Angélica is an ambitious, aristocratic and secretly psychotic young woman who will stop at nothing to achieve her goals, not even murdering her parents, her grandmother, her husband and her children...
title: El ángel caído
